descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted the Jagged crown BUT you had to return it to Ulfric/Tulius?

With this mod you can craft the Jagged crown and wear it for yourself

The crown can be crafted at any forge and is in the daedric section, however 
you do not need the daedric crafting skill. It will be unlocked at the ver
start of the game.

-_-_-_-_-_-_-
Installation
-_-_-_-_-_-_-

Go to computer/program Files (may be x86)
Then steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data 

And drag Craftable Jagged Crown.esp in there

And your down

-_-_-
Note
-_-_-

You can post this on other modding sites but you MUST give me credit

I will be uploading more mods.. Ulfrics clothes and tulius armor. 
Also the rueful axe
author: yourdeathisnear1
